line: Subject, pick up the book.
Hypothesis: subject does not know what a "book" is.
note: After player fails to pick up book for a time since last line played

line: Subject, remove the rectangular object from the nearby pillar.
note: After player fails to pick up book for a time since last line played

line: Updated hypothesis: subject does not know what a "pillar" is.
note: After player fails to pick up book for a time since last line played

line: Very good. Now place the book on one of the nearby pillars.
Subject appears to have issues with corporeality. Note: apply mild adhesive to future testing equipment.
Subject has chosen the RED pillar. Results: unsatisfactory.
Subject has chosen the BLUE pillar. Results: unsatisfactory.
Subject has chosen the GREEN pillar. Results: unsatisfactory.
Subject has attempted to return the book to a bookshelf. Hypothesis: subject retains basic level of mental association.
Subject demonstrates lack of understanding in local thermodynamics. Suggestion: further reading.
Subject has re-chosen initial placement. Results: satisfactory.
note: Player puts book back where it was picked up

line: Subject has chosen the GOLDEN pillar. Results: extremely satisfactory.
note: Player puts book on gold pillar

line: Subject has chosen unexpected pillar. Results: additional testing needed.
note: Player puts book on any tall pillar

line: Experiment failed. Suggestion: administer high-level behavioral correction to subject.
Subject has defied all theoretical expectations. Results: unknown.
note: Player somehow manages to place the book somewhere actually unexpected

line: Take the experimental device.
Come on, just walk into it and it'll bind to your form.
note: After player fails to pick up launcher for a time since last line played

line: The launcher, subject! Take the launcher!
note: After player fails to pick up launcher for a time since last line played

line: Subject is showing resistance to the experience. New protocol: ignore the subject until directions are obeyed.
note: After player fails to pick up launcher for a time since last line played

line: Next, operate the mechanism until results are obtained.
Hypothesis: subject is making an admirable attempt to educate the spirit fish.
Subject shows aggressive behavior. Note: administer reward.
Data collection in progress...
Results presently unclear. More data needed.
The data is accumulating!
More! More!
Enough data collected. Come, let's de-graft that thing from you.
